adrFormatAddress: 2225 5th Ave, New York, NY 10037, USA

originalText.text: My prayers have been answered! I have been neglecting the dentist because of horrible experiences in the past. I met someone through a friend and they referred me to Harlem Dental!! I’m in love! It is the best dental place EVER! Everyone from the front desk staff, the hygienists and the Doctor herself were absolutely wonderful. Not to mention the gentle touch and the phenomenal approach to all dental concerns. Dr. Riordan, Tamara, Mariana, Jenny, Roslyn you guys are amazing. Thank you for a finally have a forever dentist!!!

originalText.text: I’ve been going here for years and I have to say hands down the best dental practice I’ve ever been to! Super nice staff, everyone is knowledgeable and a total pro, and they do a fantastic and thorough job with everything. Do yourself a favor and if you live anywhere near here make these folks your dental practice!

text.text: I’ve been going here for years and I have to say hands down the best dental practice I’ve ever been to! Super nice staff, everyone is knowledgeable and a total pro, and they do a fantastic and thorough job with everything. Do yourself a favor and if you live anywhere near here make these folks your dental practice!

originalText.text: It's now been 4 years since i started seeing Dr. Riordan. Her office is always clean and inviting. Her staff is always friendly, helpful and professional. She is a hidden dental gem in Harlem. Thank you Dr. Riordan and staff.

text.text: It's now been 4 years since i started seeing Dr. Riordan. Her office is always clean and inviting. Her staff is always friendly, helpful and professional. She is a hidden dental gem in Harlem. Thank you Dr. Riordan and staff.

originalText.text: A year ago I was seen and very pleased with my experience. Yesterday I had the pleasure of being cared for by another young lady, whose name I‘ve let slip my mind  But she was so vibrant and made me feel at eased that my experience can only be rated five stars again! Thank you, Harlem Dental associates

originalText.text: I really like this dentist office as everyone there is friendly and professional. You don't feel like your being upsold for teeth whitening or other services. And they speak to you like you've not spent any time studying to be a dentist. I.e they speak in plain speak which is really welcomed.
